text:
@realDonaldTrump @FoxNews NATIONAL EMERGENCY (Caused by Trump)!
"As a debilitated, diabolical Trump plans to #ReopenAmerica, Senior Pentagon leaders say #CoronavirusPandemic could continue for months and the military would need to continue to support efforts to counter it for as long as needed." https://t.co/GOBJOeZUEF

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
